name: Splunk
overview: Monitor LaunchDarkly flag changes in Splunk
description: This integration sends LaunchDarkly audit log events (flag, project, environment changes) to Splunk.
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: HTTP event collector base URL
formVariables.description: Enter your [Splunk HTTP event collector base URL](https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/latest/Data/UsetheHTTPEventCollector).

formVariables.name: Token
formVariables.description: Enter your HTTP event collector token value.

formVariables.name: Skip certificate verification
formVariables.description: Splunk Cloud instances sign their own SSL certificates by default. If you use Splunk Cloud, you may need to skip certificate validation in order for this integration to work.
